channel.title: Please Read!
channel.description:
okay so, hello, I've been Playing coding and hosting RSPS Since 2009. also I've been coding Websites (PHP, HTML, JAVA SCRIPTS, CSS+, DESIGNER) for 6 years now.
well i'm looking for some awesome RSPS which is not popular and wants to be popular and has a goal that it wants to achieve. I'll take care of the website and help coding and pay for advertise it on websites and shit like that, i can add allot of things to website, Highscores, vote4cash, and etc....
i can pay for the website domain which will be .com, all you need is: a server with goal ahead of it. server that is up and at least can be hosted 24/7. i don't care if its popular or not. it must be with version 700+ (not old rs).
what will i get? i will get owner, but: i wont make staff with out talking things out with the other owner. i wont sell staff for rs cash or real money. i wont make any decision without talking things over with the other owner.
if your interested please comment below or add me on skype: ahmed.diab1998
Thanks.

item.title: Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If you’re interested in applying to become a part of a servers team, then I would advise that you check out the [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,149.0.htmlDevelopment teams[/url] board. I’ll have to lock this as it is in the wrong section.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Flame_ for Sectional Mod.
OT: Wrong section, if you’re looking for a development team go to the Development Teams section.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Hi there.
If you’re looking to join a development team for a R.S.P.S., then please visit this section of the forums. Just take a look around until you find a server in development that you like, and you can check if they are looking for a developer in this section of the forums.
For future reference, understand that these sorts of topics are not welcome on these forums, and you can easily find a team to join by looking in the RS2 Server Development boards.
Good luck.

Read full topic

/thread
